website_summaries.verdict: Spicy and slightly sweet ginger beer made using "fiery" Jamaican ginger root extract.
pros: Has a real kick, made using spicy Jamaican ginger root extract, and slightly sweet
Comes in recyclable cans for convenience
cons: A few tasters thought this ginger beer was "too sweet

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I first tried Old Jamaica while visiting England and fell in love with it. I'd never had ginger beer before, only ginger ale. What a difference. I was so happy to find it on Amazon. Like another reviewer, I wish it wasn't so expensive. I have also tried Royalty and Idris Fiery ginger beers and while both are good, (and less expensive) to me, they don't compare to Old Jamaica. This one is so spicy and has a real kick. SO GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Note: contains an artificial sweetner.
customer_reviews.text: I DID NOT KNOW IT CONTAINED AN ARTIFICIAL SWEETNER UNTIL I RECEIVED THE PRODUCT AND READ THE INGREDIENTS. IT OUGHT TO BE NOTED IN THE AD FOR THE PRODUCT. I GOT A REFUND FROM AMAZON. IT IS EXTREMELY SWEET TO TASTE.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive ingredients picture fails to mention the sucralose
customer_reviews.text: Let's talk about that alleged picture of the can on the page The ingredients list as pictured mentions water, sugar, citric acid, stabilizer, ginger root, preservative. The can I hold in my hand says the same but also mentions sucralose. If you find the taste of sucralose repulsive, this is not the ginger beer for you.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Best Ginger Beer One Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: Old Jamaican Style Ginger Beer is one of the absolute best I've ever tasted. My order arrived neatly packaged, and none of the cans were dented--like the Barr's cans that were sent before. I have had authentic ginger beer--while visiting Jamaica--and this one taste better. Thanks Amazon--I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi P.

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this and another ginger beer for my bday as I am a big Dark n Stormy fan. This ginger beer is ok, but I felt it had an artificial sweetener taste which I am not fond of.
customer_reviews.author: California Ranch Life

customer_reviews.title: Sugar AND Artificial Sweetner (Sucralose)?
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ginger beer. Tastes like diet ginger ale. Weak for a ginger beer and overly sweet lingering aftertaste from the sucralose. I will NEVER buy this again. Barritts is far superior. Maine Root is the best.
customer_reviews.author: nowhere man

customer_reviews.title: This brand has an odd (not in a good way) flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Nasty stuff, this ginger beer. I always keep some ginger beer in my fridge and enjoy trying different brands. I bought a whole case of this and am very disappointed in the earthy taste and artificial sweetener.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Tibbets

customer_reviews.title: I love this ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: I love this ginger beer. It is everything you could want slightly sweet with a fiery kick. It's perfect with a little lime and if you want it works as a great mixer.
customer_reviews.author: I read too much???

customer_reviews.title: I replaced alcoholic beer with this product
customer_reviews.text: This Ginger Beer has a lot of flavor without a lot of hot pepper. Much more than a ginger ale. Everyone I have shared them with really like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: matt baildon

customer_reviews.title: BEST GINGER BEER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ginger beer on the planet! We have not found it's equal in taste. If you really want the best mules, buy this brand! Only downside is it can be pricey!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Meekhof

customer_reviews.title: Great spicy ginger beer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great spicy ginger beer! It is my favorite, but has been hard to get. I was so happy to see that it is now available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Cavagnaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: Tried many different ginger beers. Found this ginger beer in Brussels last year. By far the best tasting without the heavy after taste of ginger.
customer_reviews.author: alex agulian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great taste! Must have. A great taste of ginger that the whole family will love.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: yummy and addictive
customer_reviews.text: I could easily become addicted to this stuff. Very yummy and very ginger!
customer_reviews.author: CrzGzr

customer_reviews.title: You will come back for more
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and refreshing. Great alinea, or added to other wines and alcoholic beverages
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the great order I will be ordering two more
customer_reviews.text: I luv the way it arrived none of my cans were bent or bubbled up. Thank you for the great order I will be ordering two more cases
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Glover

customer_reviews.title: good flavor
customer_reviews.text: best deal I can get in the US, close to D&G but cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Karee

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: It was good but I had a nicer one but it takes almost a month to get it. It was a little on the flat side not enough fizz.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Brice

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as expected. Since so many people rated this the best ginger beer, I decided to buy it. Don't get me wrong, it is good but certainly not the best. It is very sweet and has only a slight ginger taste. My favorite is Fever-Tree.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: The Ginger beer was great but when i got it the plastic caseing was open and one of the cans was missing. So someone in the wearhouse got thirsty and decided to have one on me. And can't send it back because i needed it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Graves

customer_reviews.title: Beer/Ale
customer_reviews.text: It's Ginger Ale. Jamaica it's beer in the US it's ale, same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Max Trent

customer_reviews.title: Best Ginger soda
customer_reviews.text: This drink is far superior to ginger ale from Canada dry or Seagram's.
customer_reviews.author: Caylee Jug

customer_reviews.title: Just not good.
customer_reviews.text: This Ginger Beer is not good. Artificial sweeteners give it a bad aftertaste, and the overall flavor profile just isn't good. Find/order Windmill Ginger Beer (made in Illinois) if you want to taste what the highest quality Ginger Beer should be. Fever tree is a distant second.
customer_reviews.author: Walleye Joe

product_meta.title: Old Jamaica Ginger Beer 330ml (24 Pack)
product_meta.description: Get a hold of a bottle of Old Jamaican Ginger Beer with some fresh lime and a dash of bitters. The taste is lingering and memorable and will have you doing it over and over again.Old Jamaica Ginger Beer is the UK's favorite ginger beer. Made with real fiery Jamaican root ginger, either on its own or as a mixer.
